docs.snippet: NEW DELHI, India, Nov. 19 -- The Third Assembly of the World Council of Churches opened here today with a splash of color, a keynote of solemnity and an expression of hope for greater Christian unity.

docs.snippet: UNITED NATIONS, N.Y., Nov. 21 -- Foreign Minister Erich H. Louw of South Africa said today that his Government would invite three past Presidents of the General Assembly to visit South-West Africa and report on conditions there.
